fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select any player on the same type (type refers to odd or even) space as you to occupy their house.
- Attack the player on the opposite side of the playerlist. If they're on the opposite type (odd or even) of space, you'll attack the closest valid target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities consider your current occupied space as your spot on the playerlist, not your actual spot.
- You learn the role of the player's house you're occupying.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Protect the King from checkmate and deliver mate to the enemy.
